resultset.statement: select sensitive_source, sensitive_name, COUNT(sensitive_name) AS num, DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL - 6 DAY) AS startData, CURDATE() AS endDate FROM behavior_sensitive_word_report WHERE sensitive_source ='com.tencent.mm' AND use_date >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL - 6 DAY) GROUP BY sensitive_name ORDER BY num DESC limit 20
